channel.title: Black Screen Login
channel.description: Okay so i'm using Vengeance-X PVP V2, and when I login, the gameframe all shows up but the box where my character should appear doesnt appear for about 10-15 seconds, it just stays black. When other players login, some of them ahve the same problem and others it does this then says connection lost attempting to reestablish, Thus making the entire server lag/freeze for 3-5 seconds. The server PC im using is at 0 % cpu usage and 0-2% engine load with 4 players online so i dont think its a PC problem. any ideas?
